game.title: Bloodspill
game.short_description: Bloodspill is a fast-paced, pvp retro fps with one hit combat, featuring classic gamemodes like deathmatch, capture the flag and conquest!
game.long_description: Bloodspill is a fast-paced, pvp retro fps with one hit combat, featuring classic game modes like Deathmatch, Capture the Flag and Conquest<video controls width='100%'><source src='assets/dm.webm' type='video/webm'></video>
